title: Sales tax impact on consumer, producer surplus

content.question: Suppose that the market supply curve for shoes is upward sloping and the market demand curve is downward sloping. How will the imposition of a sales tax on shoes affect the consumer surplus, the producer surplus, and the total surplus?

choices.label: Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Total Surplus Decrease Increase Decrease
